properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to Stonington, ME out 25 NM; Coastal Waters from Eastport, ME to Schoodic Point, ME out 25 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 12 at 1:52AM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
6 to 11 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Eastport, ME to Schoodic Point, ME
out 25 NM and Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to
Stonington, ME out 25 NM.

* WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
